model.name: Heiland2019 - NAD pathway model analysing the impact of NNMT on pathway dynamics and evolution

body.p: This is a detailed model of NAD biosynthesis and consumption representing pathway variances across kingdoms.

rdf:Description.dcterms:description: Km from recombinant human enzyme, similar to mouse Km
turnover calculated from enzyme 1300 fold purified from porcine liver, Km=0.83
Keq used to calculate turnover for reverse reaction

body.pre:
cell size HeLa 3e-12 l fibro blast 1e-12l
maximal E. coli uptake NA http://www.jbc.org/content/248/14/5144.full.pdf 630 molceules per cell and s
thus approx. 1 mikroM/s
HeLa (epithelial; 8.2 0.3 fmol/10 min), NIH-3T3 cells : The apparent Km of NAD transport was 190 M while the Vmax was 429 pmol/well/10 min. http://www.jbc.org/content/283/10/6367.full
(1.2e6 cells per well according to thermo fisher cell culture specifications)
thus approx. 0.2 mikroM/s
15mg uptake per 60kg body = 2.5e-8 mmol/ls
